com.tigertext.ttandroid.pubsub

Class TTPubSub

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.tigertext.ttandroid.pubsub.TTPubSub

  • public class TTPubSub
extends java.lang.Object
    TTPubSub is the publish/subscribe module for the SDK. Clients should subscribe any of the events in TTEvent.java.

    Usage :

    Classes that needs to listen to the event should implement TTPubSub.Listener interface and call the addListener function with a specific Event type. All the events will be received in onEventReceived(...) method.

    public class MyClass extends Activity implements TTPubSub.Listener{ onCreate(...){ addListener(Event.ROSTER_UPDATED, this); }

    onDestroy(...){ removeListener(Event.ROSTER_UPDATED, this) }

    public void onEventReceived(String type, Object obj){

    } }

    Note : All the events will be delivered in TTPubsub worker thread. Do not block this thread and do not perform and UI operation on this thread.
